Name: ECO
Natural: The ECO Series E6000 HVLP spray guns are value-priced and efficient for latex, stains, and general finishing. Offering 3 fan patterns and simple maintenance, it’s ideal for DIYers seeking an affordable and versatile HVLP solution.

Name: Paasche
Natural: The Paasche TG-3WC is a double-action, gravity-feed airbrush made in the USA, featuring chrome plating, PTFE seals, and precision control for fine detail. It includes multiple nozzles and accessories—perfect for professionals and artists alike.

Name: Finex
Natural: The Finex FX3000 is a full-size HVLP spray gun with a large 12.5” pattern and multiple nozzles for base coat, primer, and clear. With a low trigger pull, aluminum cup, and reduced part count, it’s ideal for automotive and industrial use.

Name: SATA
Natural: The SATAjet 5000 B offers flexible HVLP and RP spraying with ergonomic Porsche-designed controls and optimized nozzles for varying distances. Designed for automotive, carpentry, and marine applications, it ensures comfort and premium finishes.

Name: Fuji
Natural: Fuji’s Q PLATINUM™ series features patented noise-reduction HVLP turbines that run at as low as 58 dBA. Best for indoor or shared spaces, while the lighter Mini-Mite PLATINUM™ is suited for portable, on-the-go use when sound isn’t a concern.

Name: HomeRight
Natural: The HomeRight Finish Max HVLP sprayer offers a smooth, brush-free finish for small to medium projects. With a 2.0mm brass tip, 3 spray patterns, and 400W motor, it’s ideal for crafts, furniture, and DIY cabinetry with minimal overspray.

Name: Wagner
Natural: The Wagner Control Pro 130 Power Tank features High Efficiency Airless tech for up to 55% less overspray, a 1.5-gal hopper, and 25-ft hose. Great for large indoor/outdoor projects, it offers smooth, consistent finishes with easy cleanup.

Name: Graco
Natural: The Graco Magnum Project Painter Plus is a beginner-friendly sprayer for interior and exterior tasks, letting users spray directly from 1 or 5 gallon paint buckets. Designed for DIYers, it offers fast coverage and simple operation.
